remarks: Each coset is equipotent to the subgroup itself (which is also the coset containing the identity).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2015.)
statement:
eqger.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
eqger.r $e |- .~ = ( G ~QG Y ) $.
eqgen $p |- ( ( Y e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. ( X /. .~ ) ) -> Y ~~ A ) $.
